insert into t_buildingSale (buildingSaleId, saleDate, deliveryDate, averagePrice, deliveryRate, occupancyRate, buildingId) values (#{buildingsaleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{saledate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{deliverydate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{averageprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deliveryrate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{occupancyrate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{buildingid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update t_buildingSale set saleDate = #{saledate,jdbcType=DATE}, deliveryDate = #{deliverydate,jdbcType=DATE}, averagePrice = #{averageprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, deliveryRate = #{deliveryrate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, occupancyRate = #{occupancyrate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, buildingId = #{buildingid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where buildingSaleId = #{buildingsaleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select buildingSaleId, saleDate, deliveryDate, averagePrice, deliveryRate, occupancyRate, buildingId from t_buildingSale where buildingSaleId = #{buildingsaleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select buildingSaleId, saleDate, deliveryDate, averagePrice, deliveryRate, occupancyRate, buildingId from t_buildingSale
